trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Savannah
There were no other sightings in Savannah on or around March 2nd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking into work at and notice 5 planes with chemtrails flying parallel to each other. As I started looking for other aircraft, I came across this bright star looking object. I spoke to an International Longshoreman and asked him what he thought the object was. He did not know. I got a coworker to walk to the window and showed her. She could not explain the object either. I definitely counted 5 jets with chemtrails and could have been 6 (one flying perpendicular based on the trail. The unidentified object stood still hoovering at a very high altitude.
Summary: White object high in the sky during the day light. 5 jets went by with chemtrails.
